name: flight_booker
description: The tool will be used to book a flight. Booking a flight requires a name, email, phone number, city of departure and destination city, and all details are compulsory.
schema: [{"id":0,"property":"name","description":"name of the booked flight","type":"string","required":true},{"id":1,"property":"email","description":"email of the booked flight","type":"string","required":true},{"id":2,"property":"phone_number","description":"phone number of the booked flight","type":"string","required":true},{"id":3,"property":"city_of_departure","description":"city of departure of the booked flight","type":"string","required":true},{"id":4,"property":"destination_city","description":"destination city of the booked flight","type":"string","required":true}]
